message: Starting implementation of current_value synchronization for PLC read operations
Analyzed current system - found that component_parameters table has current_value/set_value columns but parameter logging doesn't update them
Implemented current_value synchronization in transactional system - modified interfaces, dual-mode repository with bulk updates, and compensation mechanisms

IMPLEMENTATION COMPLETE: Successfully extended transactional dual-mode repository with atomic component_parameters.current_value synchronization, bulk updates, compensation actions, and ACID guarantees. Ready for coordination with implementer-112308-b5d86b for continuous logger integration.
